string.value: 召唤发条熊猫、机器章鱼王、红螃蟹、僵尸猴、黄色战斗机、空军雀各3只.

string.name: desc
string.value: 召唤木马士兵、积木王、大幽灵、外星人元帅、混种石头人各3只.

string.name: desc
string.value: 召唤蘑菇王、赤龙、冰龙、大恶灵附身的娃娃、黑大雪人各3只.

string.name: desc
string.value: 召唤长枪牛魔王、蓝色鬼怪、黑色飞狮、狼人、贝贝各3只.

string.name: desc
string.value: 召唤白狼人、恶灵附身的娃娃、大海贼王、巫婆各3只.

string.name: desc
string.value: 召唤火狗5只、蝙蝠怪2只、蝙蝠魔1只.

string.name: desc
string.value: 召唤怪物入侵第1~第3阶段的怪物各1只.

string.name: desc
string.value: 召唤怪物入侵第4~第7阶段的怪物各1只.

string.name: desc
string.value: A marble that contains poisoned monsters. Use it to bring out the poisoned monster from the marble.

string.name: desc
string.value: A marble that contains poisoned monsters on the 1st floor. Use it to bring out the poisoned monster from the marble.

string.name: desc
string.value: A marble that contains poisoned monsters on the 2nd floor. Use it to bring out the poisoned monster from the marble.

string.name: desc
string.value: A marble that contains poisoned monsters on the 3rd floor. Use it to bring out the poisoned monster from the marble.

string.name: desc
string.value: 宠物喜欢的饲料.增加饱满感30.人不能吃.

string.name: desc
string.value: 用优质材料制造的饲料,宠物可吃.

string.name: desc
string.value: 双击可以给别的角色新年贺卡.

string.name: desc
string.value: 可以判断是否在使用非法程序的道具.对正在攻击怪物的玩家才可以使用

string.name: desc
string.value: 如水晶雕像的神奇力量融入体内,将会变身.此神奇的魔法力量会持续一个小时.

string.name: desc
string.value: 如水晶雕像的神奇力量融入体内,将会变身.此神奇的魔法力量会持续一个小时.

string.name: desc
string.value: 如水晶雕像的神奇力量融入体内,将会变身.此神奇的魔法力量会持续一个小时.

string.name: desc
string.value: 摩伊拉所制作的秘药,服用后可在一段时间内变身成为蜥蜴龙族的样貌.

string.name: desc
string.value: 能变成警卫提干的样子的变身药水.

string.name: desc
string.value: 可以在红蜗牛王身上得到的特别的壳儿.据说拥有实现他人愿望的魔力……

string.name: desc
string.value: 忽然觉得身体很轻,身体已经飘在空中了.啊!是幽灵!

string.name: desc
string.value: 不知以什么制成的,长得像幽灵的糖果.据说有特别的能力.

string.name: desc
string.value: 虽然很久以前被苏菲莉亚丢弃,再次被名匠赋予生命的人偶.抚摸它的头时,可以变身成为苏菲莉亚三分钟.变身维持3分钟,3分钟前无法任意取消.

string.name: desc
string.value: 喝下药水的瞬间可以变身为超人.

string.name: desc
string.value: 喝下药水的瞬间可以变身为超人.

string.name: desc
string.value: 变身成为小巧可爱的老鼠.

string.name: desc
string.value: 因年老的矮人族克隆的秘术暂时变成龙的造型 . 可以飞向天空.

string.name: desc
string.value: A picture given by Cody of himself. I get a feeling something fun will happen when I use it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A picture of a delicious cake that Cody gave as a gift. I get a feeling something funny with happen when I use it.

string.name: desc
string.value: 喝掉药水的瞬间会变成什么模样谁都不知道.

string.name: desc
string.value: 双击的话可使对方变身的神秘药水,会变成什么模样谁都不知道.

string.name: desc
string.value: 戒指盒里放着月长石订婚戒指.在求婚时可以使用的戒指盒.

string.name: desc
string.value: 戒指盒里放着闪耀新星订婚戒指.在求婚时可以使用的戒指盒.

string.name: desc
string.value: 戒指盒里放着金心订婚戒指.在求婚时可以使用的戒指盒.

string.name: desc
string.value: 戒指盒里放着银翼订婚戒指.在求婚时可以使用的戒指盒.

string.name: desc
string.value: 可以恢复被驯服的怪物的疲倦值30

string.name: desc
string.value: 坎特制作的费洛蒙香水,它可以驯服在下一个村落里的野猪.

string.name: desc
string.value: 拥有宝石装饰的袋子.拥有神秘的力量,双击的话,可以抓住徘徊在周围的幽灵.

string.name: desc
string.value: 吸收怪兽力量时变为宝石的,特殊的炼金术道具.里面是半透明的.

string.name: desc
string.value: 可以驯服迷路的圣诞鹿的克里夫的魔法杖.

string.name: desc
string.value: 把中毒的怪物装进去,使其得到净化的特殊的魔法之珠.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special magic marble that can contain a poisoned monster on the 1st floor.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special magic marble that can contain a poisoned monster on the 2nd floor.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special magic marble that can contain a poisoned monster on the 3rd floor.

string.name: desc
string.value: 装有熔岩的瓶子,瓶子里的熔岩还在翻滚.喝了这瓶熔岩,火花会渗透到体内,可以修炼火凤球.

string.name: desc
string.value: 制造乌云的机器,造出了乌云就可以修炼成烟雾弹.

string.name: desc
string.value: 放在像紧握的拳头模样的瓶子里的觉醒剂,喝了可以提高勇士的意志.

string.value: 破烂的冒险骑士团之书第1卷

string.name: desc
string.value: 使用后有一股神秘的力量包围我的身体,为我降下祝福.搜集20个后,可以阅读里面的文字.

string.name: desc
string.value: 使用后有一股神秘的力量包围我的身体,为我降下祝福.搜集20个后,可以阅读里面的文字.

string.name: desc
string.value: 答对冒险骑士团有关的问题,可以获得幸运.点击即可进行挑战.

string.name: desc
string.value: This firecracker has been specially made to celebrate July 4th, 1776, our Independence Day. For 10 minutes, Speed and Jump increase by 5.

string.name: desc
string.value: This firecracker has been specially made to celebrate July 4th, 1776, our Independence Day. For 10 minutes, Attack and Magic increase by 5.

string.name: desc
string.value: This firecracker has been specially made to celebrate July 4th, 1776, our Independence Day. For 10 minutes, Def. and Magic Def. increase by 10.

string.name: desc
string.value: 用生长在圣地的药草制作的药水,专为高级职业制作.\n恢复HP50.

string.name: desc
string.value: 用生长在圣地的药草制作的药水,专为高级职业制作.\n恢复MP100.

string.name: desc
string.value: 渔网里好像捞到了什么.双击可以确认上面的东西.

string.name: desc
string.value: 吞下了什么东西的鱼.双击可以确认肚子里的东西.

string.name: desc
string.value: 受到净化的森林中降下的金色光雨的影响,移动速度和跳跃力提高了.

string.name: desc
string.value: 用牛肉和香菇,以及桔梗串在一起制成的著名小吃.\nHP和MP恢复大约1500.

string.name: desc
string.value: 香甜可口的月花糕.吃了之后,HP和MP各恢复1500.

string.name: desc
string.value: 香甜可口的月花糕.吃了之后,15分钟内攻击力和魔力各提高8.

string.name: desc
string.value: 香甜可口的月花糕.吃了之后,15分钟内移动速度和跳跃力分别提高5和3.

string.name: desc
string.value: 录有各种日常琐事的磁带.双击可以确认内容.

string.name: desc
string.value: 佳佳的感谢之心.1小时内攻击力和魔力增加20,物理防御力和魔法防御力增加400,命中值和回避值增加200,移动速度和跳跃力增加10.

string.name: desc
string.value: 受到了魔女的祝福.20分钟内攻击力和魔力增加10,物理防御力和魔法防御力增加150,命中值和回避值增加100,移动速度和跳跃力增加3.

string.name: desc
string.value: 不知道装着什么的箱子.怀着忐忑不安的心情把它打开吧.幸运的话,可以获得让人心动的礼物.\n#c双击可以打开.#

string.name: desc
string.value: 只限在武陵道场使用,可阻挡敌人的攻击三次.

string.name: desc
string.value: 可以恢复所有异常状态.

string.name: desc
string.value: 15分钟内物理攻击力提高30,魔法攻击力提高30.

string.name: desc
string.value: 在金利奇的迷宫中可以获得的经验值.

string.name: desc
string.value: 15分钟内物理攻击力提高20,魔法攻击力提高30.

string.name: desc
string.value: 传说中的秘药.\nHP、MP全部恢复.

string.name: desc
string.value: 1小时内物理攻击力增加5,魔力增加10,物理防御力增加100,魔法防御力增加100,移动速度增加10.

string.name: desc
string.value: 30分钟内金币掉落量提高为2倍.

string.name: desc
string.value: 30分钟内物品掉落率提高为2倍.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc

string.name: desc

string.name: name
string.value: 飞翔的怪物召唤包(纹样)

string.name: desc
string.value: 召唤白外星人司令一党.

string.name: desc
string.value: 盯着看时,会觉得精神变得恍惚,感觉自己逐渐在向月亮靠近.

string.name: desc
string.value: 香甜可口的月花糕.有时候会发挥出奇怪的力量……

string.name: desc
string.value: 双击可以变身冒险岛世界最有人气的NPC佳佳.

string.name: desc
string.value: 可以变身成佩托的药水.假面绅士给的变身药水.使用后,可以在15分钟内变身.

string.name: desc
string.value: 可以捕捉迷宫猪猪的紫色丝带

string.name: desc
string.value: 可以用来捕捉什么东西的渔网.在佳佳那里可以使用.

string.name: desc
string.value: 可以捕捉迷宫猪猪的红色丝带

string.name: desc
string.value: 画着玩世不恭的花蘑菇的卡片.

string.name: desc
string.value: 上面画有武公的卡片.\n##c在武陵打怪时,\n提升道具/金币暴率#

string.name: desc
string.value: 可以对金利奇的迷宫中的黄金钥匙房间重新进行设置.

string.name: desc
string.value: 可以查看当前自己的位置和黄金钥匙房间的位置.

string.name: desc
string.value: #c双击#后可以在道具宝壶中饲养可爱的道具橘子宝宝.\n贪吃鬼靠吃和主人等级相似的怪物的战利品或装备物品成长.长大后可以获得奖励.

string.value: 等待冒险的紧张感让人感觉兴奋.物理防御力和魔法防御力增加10.

string.name: desc
string.value: 使用猪美美的翅膀,移动速度增加8.

string.name: desc
string.value: 星星为参加星星狂欢节的冒险家施加的祝福.15分钟内物理攻击力提高5,魔法攻击力提高5.

string.name: desc
string.value: 喜爱阳光的春天的花朵.HP恢复约2000.

string.name: desc
string.value: 预示着春天的到来的花.HP恢复约2000.

string.name: desc
string.value: 象征着幸运的草.HP恢复约2000.

string.name: desc
string.value: 金达莱的花语是爱.30分钟内金币掉落率提高2倍.

string.name: desc
string.value: 迎春花的花语是希望.30分钟内物品掉落率提高2倍.

string.name: desc
string.value: 四叶草的花语是幸运.1小时内物品掉落率提高2倍.

string.name: desc
string.value: 为了封印蝙蝠怪而设置在地下神殿里的封印.抑制所有有生命的生物的能力.

string.name: desc
string.value: 持有英雄战剑的人的能力会在崔斯坦的保护下增强.物理攻击力+30,魔法攻击力+30

string.name: desc
string.value: 发出尖叫,可以暂时减缓狼的速度.

string.name: desc
string.value: 使用快速移动就可以逃离敌人的威胁.

string.name: desc
string.value: 受到狼的攻击后,在1个回合内保护自己.

string.name: desc
string.value: 攻击狼的后脑勺,使狼暂时无法移动.

string.name: desc
string.value: 使羊群魂飞魄散,失去方向感.

string.name: desc
string.value: 威胁羊,使羊陷入虚弱状态.

string.name: desc
string.value: 只有在小羊牧场可以得到的刻着？的黄金蛋.双击后就可以看到里面装的物品.

string.name: desc
string.value: 冒险岛4周年礼物箱.里面到底装着什么礼物呢？\n\n#c鼠标双击可以打开. #

string.name: desc
string.value: 魔女的魔物饼干猫咪施加的祝福.在40分钟内攻击力和魔力增加10,防御力增加30,命中率和回避率增加20.

string.name: desc
string.value: 超过了2500点,获得了比赛支援.攻击力+3,魔力+6,移动速度+6

string.name: desc
string.value: 超过了4000点,获得了比赛支援.攻击力+5,魔力+10,移动速度+15

string.name: desc
string.value: 可以进入4周年全家福摄影活动摄影棚的券.

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal piece that resembles Blue Ribbon Pig. When used, the crystal will melt into the body, and its mythical power will transform the user into Blue Ribbon Pig. This mythical power will last for an hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: 不知道会召唤出什么怪物,但据卡珊德拉说可能会召唤出从未见过的怪物

string.name: desc
string.value: 召唤炸弹,夺走羊身上的毛.

string.name: desc
string.value: 种下有刺的蔷薇,阻止狼接近.

string.name: desc
string.value: 进入童话,变身成杰佩托.虽然身体有点笨重,但试着和队员们一起离开迷宫吧.

string.name: desc
string.value: 水晶雕像的神秘力量融入体内之后,我已经不再是自己了.

string.name: desc
string.value: 变身为企鹅普里普里的样子.效果持续60分钟.

string.name: desc
string.value: 变身为企鹅普里普里的样子.效果持续60分钟.

string.value: 变身为企鹅普里普里的样子.效果持续60分钟.

string.value: 变身为企鹅普里普里的样子.效果持续60分钟.

string.name: desc
string.value: 画着蝙蝠怪的卡片.\n#c在金银岛中央迷宫打猎时物品/金币掉落率提高#

string.name: desc
string.value: 写满了看不懂的文字.\n#c双击可以开始执行任务.#

string.name: desc
string.value: 指向钻石王老五宝物岛位置的黄金罗盘. \n#c双击#后可以移动到宝物岛.

string.name: desc
string.value: 含有小冒险家的香味的香水.\n#c双击#可以发出香味,骗过怪物.

string.name: desc
string.value: 不知道年份的遗物. \n#c双击可以确认#年份.

string.name: desc
string.value: 召唤工作员.运营员活动用

string.name: desc
string.value: 解散工作员.运营员活动用

string.name: desc
string.value: 在马来西亚非常受欢迎的料理.鸡肉片与咖喱及牛奶的完美结合非常香甜可口. \n恢复HP 4000.

string.name: desc
string.value: 很著名的马来传统食物.含有米粉,与酸酐,豆干,豆芽,鸡蛋和花生.\n恢复 4000 MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: 这道著名的佳肴,含有丰富的甜辣花生酱,黄瓜,虾膏,豆芽,和白萝卜.\n恢复 1000 HP 及1000 MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: 马来风味的辛辣料理.\n10分钟内提高武器的物理攻击力和魔法力＋8

string.name: desc
string.value: 这些小甜点,是马来族派队的最爱,适合饮茶配合.\n促进 速度 +10 30 分钟.

string.name: desc
string.value: A stinky dish made with Cursed Frog Eggs. Increases 400 HP if eaten.

string.name: desc
string.value: A non-alcoholic wine made by the Witch using Cursed Cat Spittle. Increases 200 MP when consumed.

string.name: desc
string.value: A creepy and slimy Canape that the Witch has made for you. Increases Weapon ATT and Weapon DEF +15 for 15 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A suspiciously sharp-tasting Kabab that the Witch has made for you. Increases Magic ATT And Magic DEF +15 for 15 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: The Witch's wrap dish that fills your mouth with the aroma of the swamp with each bite. Increases Weapon ATT and Weapon DEF +25 for 15 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A rough leather steak that the Witch has carefully grilled for you. Increases Magic ATT And Magic Defense +25 for 15 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: The Witch's special stew that gives off a sour stink. Increases Weapon and Magic ATT +40, Weapons and Magic DEF +100, and Speed and Jump +15 for 15 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A scroll that, depending on chance, will either improve or worsen the Talking Witch Hat or Broomstick obtained from the Witch.

string.name: desc
string.value: A scroll that, depending on chance, will either improve or worsen the Witch's Belts obtained from the Witch.

string.name: desc
string.value: A sack that Cassandra gave you as a gift. On it appears a note that reads "Open with Friends."

string.name: desc
string.value: An offensive-looking leech costume. Can be worn to trick your friends.

string.name: desc
string.value: A huge roasted turkey leg. It's so big that it seems like it would take all day to finish eating.\n[Gives +30 Physical Attack for 3 minutes]

string.name: desc
string.value: 用生长在里恩岛上的药草制作而成的药水.\n恢复HP100.

string.name: desc
string.value: 用生长在里恩岛上的药草制作而成的药水.\n恢复MP50.

string.name: desc
string.value: 可以快速移动.\n10分钟内移动速度增加.

string.name: desc
string.value: 装有战神发布纪念礼物的纸箱.包装得非常好,必须#c双击#打开后,才能知道里面装的是什么东西.

string.value: 艾娜亲手制作的三明治.早上吃的话,可以一天不饿.

string.name: desc
string.value: 农场生产的新鲜牛奶. \nHP大约恢复100.

string.name: desc
string.value: 农场生产的新鲜果汁. \nMP大约恢复50.

string.name: desc
string.value: 在身体被芬芳的玫瑰香味围绕的瞬间,感到脑袋发沉,脚步变得沉重.在香味消失之前,去见见拉娜吧.

string.name: desc
string.value: 在身体被清爽的小苍兰香味围绕的瞬间,感到脑袋发沉,脚步变得沉重.在香味消失之前,去见见拉娜吧.

string.name: desc
string.value: 在身体被甜美的薰衣草香味围绕的瞬间,感到脑袋发沉,脚步变得沉重.在香味消失之前,去见见拉娜吧.

string.name: desc
string.value: 神奇的未成熟玛瑙苹果.1分钟内可提高物理攻击力+60,魔法攻击力+70,防御力+10.

string.name: desc
string.value: 能直接回到新叶城的卷轴,用一次就消失.

string.name: desc
string.value:
神奇的北斗卫星指导书.
传说是由该书封面上的冒险岛勇士
昨日小睡流传下来的，据说集齐7
本以后会有意想不到的事情发生，是什么呢？蹦下咔啦咔.
